thread.title: Meet GigZone: a game-changing platform for all people who are passionate about Art
thread.title_full: Meet GigZone: a game-changing platform for all people who are passionate about Art

author: admin
title: Meet GigZone: a game-changing platform for all people who are passionate about Art
text:
Softarex Technologies, Inc. 
ALEXANDRIA, Va. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- With great excitement we’re announcing that Softarex Technologies Inc. has launched a universal online booking system and online social network GigZone. This unique system is created for both entertainers and talent buyers. On one hand GigZone.com was developed to help performers to promote themselves internationally, extend their network of business connections and get a job, on the other hand – to help consumers find and hire live entertainment crew. 
“Our mission is to be one of the world's leading producers and providers of entertainment. Satisfying our customers with the appropriate level of quality is a primary goal and a fundamental element of our business,” said Alexander Lipanov, CEO of Softarex Technologies Inc. “While creating GigZone we’ve tried to combine our possibilities in latest development technologies and gained passionate experience in entertainment. We’re proud to admit that we’ve succeeded in this complicated goal. As practice shows we are able to deliver a reliable and high performance application for both parties: performers and talent buyers.” 
In constantly developing entertainment industry where new technologies emerge every day it is important to keep up with what's going on. Thanks to GigZone.com both entertainers and talent buyers will meet their targets and expand beneficial cooperation on international scale. 
ABOUT SOFTAREX TECHNOLOGIES INC. 
Softarex Technologies, Inc. takes an innovative and proactive approach to software outsourcing and custom software development (Enterprise, Web-based and Mobile). In collaboration with brilliant team of entertainment professionals and web developers with 15+ years of hands-on experience a unique online booking system GigZone was created. Inspired and actively supported by Andrey Koltsov, a world-renowned circus artist, the GigZone project is a game-changing platform for all people who are passionate about art. View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150921005792/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
